solution_line_template: Lilia earned {peaches_friends} x ${price_per_peach_friends} = $<<{peaches_friends}*{price_per_peach_friends}={earnings_friends}>>{earnings_friends} for selling the peaches to her friends.

She also earned {peaches_relatives} x ${price_per_peach_relatives} = $<<{peaches_relatives}*{price_per_peach_relatives}={earnings_relatives}>>{earnings_relatives} for selling the peaches to her relatives.
Therefore, Lilia earned ${earnings_friends} + ${earnings_relatives} = $<<{earnings_friends}+{earnings_relatives}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} for selling 14 peaches.
